raw: [{"subject":"Decoration Guidelines Coordination","description":"Coordinate floor in-charges for decoration activities, distribute attached decoration guidelines and judging criteria, ensure compliance with themes and safety.","reporter_email":"connexions@changepond.com","priority":"medium","device":null,"location":"Changepond office","tags":["event","decoration","floor"],"suggested_actions":["Assign two floor in-charges per floor","Distribute and review decoration guidelines","Set up compliance checklist"],"confidence":0.96},{"subject":"DJ Night Setup","description":"Organize DJ Night from 5:00 PM to 7:00 PM including audio equipment, lighting, and refreshments for the Diwali celebration.","reporter_email":"connexions@changepond.com","priority":"high","device":null,"location":"Changepond office","tags":["event","DJ","audio","lighting"],"suggested_actions":["Book DJ and equipment","Arrange lighting and sound setup","Coordinate refreshments and venue layout"],"confidence":0.95},{"subject":"UnplugZone No-Meeting Hour Enforcement","description":"Implement a No-Meetings, No-Calls hour from 5 PM to 7 PM during Diwali celebration, inform staff to reschedule calls and meetings.","reporter_email":"connexions@changepond.com
